name.ja: <ruby>星辰砲手<rt>ドラゴンテイル</rt></ruby>ファイメナ

text.en: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; Fusion Summon 1 Dragon or Spellcaster Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. If this card is sent to the GY as material for a Fusion Summon: You can Set 1 "Dragon Tale" Spell/Trap from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Tale Fymena" once per turn.
